metadata.name: ROTL: Darkstorm Bringers #1
metadata.description:
Our tale so far…

Together, we cannot be defeated. 
Outlaws, strangers, bandits, marauders…
These are the names they called us once.
Cult factions that are despised, disdained, and treated with a shivering gaze.

But then we found each other,
And became the most powerful organization in the legendary Moorim, the ‘Ruler of The Land’.
Our figure cloaked in fine black robes may be a nightmare to some,
But humanity can be found in the depths of the shadows, retreating from the past and the pain.
The story is there, resting still, hidden beneath the shadows.

“Are you ready to enter the black gale of the Darkstorm Bringers?”
